Player History
Drafted in 24th round, 371st overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/2015, off James Borden (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2017, hitting .375 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 8/29/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
9/11/2018: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $1,500,000 per year, for 1 years.
